name: Senryō
description:
Senryō is a 2D/3D hybrid action-adventure game inspired by the beat-em-up genre. 

The game takes place in a mythical world inspired by Japanese mythology where the player will use an oversized paintbrush to defeat enemies and clear puzzles. 

Put the pain in painting. 

website: https://maykelfaragalla.wixsite.com/senryo

team: ALLEN DAI, REYHAN ISMAIL, CHRISTIAN POMPONIO, MAYKEL SHEHATA,  NIKOLAS CHIU, BAO NGUYEN
